channel	forward	backward

pN(1440)⁺$\leftrightarrow$pp	0.8023598820058997	0.7315634218289085

2$\times$(N(1440)⁰$\leftrightarrow$π⁰n)	0.9793309052909809	0.9916247906197655

# SMASH-1.7
